Posts.Content: Hi Hawk, Glad to see the numbers holding!! My next draw will be in June which will be @ the 18 month mark. I had my 5 yr surgery anniversary back in Feb. and completely forgot about it...guess things are getting better. Hi to all and I will be lurking....... David
Posts.Signature: Age 54 Pre-op PSA 4.3 Surgery Feb. 17 2005 Post-op Path : GS 3+3=6 Right nodes: neg. Left nodes: neg. extent: right lobe 40% left lobe 10% capsular penetration: Absent SV and vasa : Uninvolved Prostate: 26 grams Post-op PSA's <0.04 for 3 years 02/08: 0.07, 03/ 08: 0.08, 06/08: 0.09 and 09/ 08: 0.1 IGRT scheduled.....11/17 FINISHED...1/14/09 05/14/09....PSA <0.04 12/03/09....PSA <0.04 06/03/10....PSA <0.04
Posts.Title: Post Salvage RT PSA Update
